service.name: activation_management
service.description: Activation request is sent to a service in order to enable service for a given tenant. Normally it would mean service should register itself in service bus and maybe run some basic initial provisioning. This call may be performed multiple times with the same parameters, in case given client ID is already registered service should just renew registration.

command.name: activate
command.summary: Notify an endpoint to activate for a given Client ID
command.description: Notify an endpoint, requesting it to register itself against service-bus
